mapper.select: SELECT s.signup_id, s.activity_id, s.user_id, s.signup_time, s.status, a.title AS activityTitle, a.location AS activityLocation, a.start_time AS activityStartTime, a.cover_image AS activityCover, a.status AS activityStatus FROM activity_signup s LEFT JOIN activity a ON s.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status != '2' ORDER BY s.signup_time DESC
